OxideKit
Features Docs Pricing GitHub
Get Started
v0.1.0 Now Available
Build Native Desktop Apps Without the Bloat
OxideKit is a Rust-native application platform. No browser, no JavaScript, no bundlers. Just fast, native apps.
Get Started Free
View on GitHub
cargo install oxide-cli && oxide new my-app
Why OxideKit?
Native Performance GPU-accelerated rendering with wgpu. Your apps start instantly and run smoothly. No browser overhead, no JavaScript VM.
Hot Reload State-preserving hot reload. Change your UI and see results instantly without losing application state.
Secure by Default Built-in permission system and network allowlists. Your users know exactly what your app can access.
Declarative UI Clean .oui syntax for describing your UI. Components, layouts, and styling in one place.
Extension Ecosystem Plugins for UI components, native capabilities, and themes. Install with oxide add.
Cross-Platform Build once, deploy to macOS, Windows, Linux. Mobile support coming soon.
2025 OxideKit. Open source under Apache 2.0.
